roleset.name: having branched systems that connect, allowing flow between them

role.descr: causer of interflow (probably a drug, if this occurs)

example.name: arg1
example.text: In the meantime , we have a known recurrence in the pelvis that-1 *-1 is anastomotic as best we can tell .
